tool_description: Resamples time series market data to different frequencies using appropriate aggregation methods for OHLCV data, enabling multi-timeframe analysis.

input_data.description: Path to time series market data to resample

aggregation_method.description: Aggregation method (ohlc, mean, sum, first, last)

error_messages: Invalid input data: Cannot access time series data or timestamp column is missing
Unsupported target frequency: Use supported frequencies (5m, 15m, 1h, 4h, 1d, 1w, 1M)
Invalid aggregation method: Use supported methods (ohlc, mean, sum, first, last)
Insufficient data: Not enough data points for meaningful resampling at target frequency
usage: Provide input data path and specify target frequency. Optionally set aggregation method. Returns resampled dataset with appropriate OHLCV aggregation.

data_points_before.description: Number of data points before resampling

data_points_after.description: Number of data points after resampling
